name: tanstack-start
description: [⚠️ RC STATUS - MONITORING FOR v1.0 STABLE] Full-stack React framework built on TanStack Router with official Cloudflare Workers support. This skill will be published when v1.0 stable is released and critical issues are resolved. Use when: building full-stack React applications, need SSR with Cloudflare Workers, want type-safe server functions, or migrating from Next.js. Currently monitoring: GitHub #5734 (memory leak with TanStack Form).
